channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Whole of road, 23rd October
item.description:
The whole of Fairhaven Avenue is a mess, the road doesn’t drain due to the road being uneven and full of holes. The road has been repaired numerous times over the years and does need complete resurfacing. It’s completely unfair that we live in a road so bad that weeds grow against the curbs and is very uneven. The road opposite us has been resurfaced but ours was left full of cracks and potholes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Fairhaven Avenue, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large trees on the verge between Bournside Close and 22 Warden Hill Road are obstructing vehicle access and require maintenance., 23rd October
item.description:
There are large trees located on the verge adjacent to the access into Bournside Close. The trees have grown significantly and are now beginning to restrict access for refuse collection vehicles and may soon prevent minibuses from reaching the school at the bottom of the lane. They are also dropping substantial debris onto the road and pavement, creating a potential safety hazard for pedestrians and vehicles. Ownership of the trees is unclear, but they are located on the verge adjacent to Bournside Close. The trees are also beginning to encroach onto nearby private property and may cause damage if not managed and cut back. Action is requested to inspect and reduce the trees to prevent further obstruction and safety issues.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Bournside Close, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
